title: Splitter
description: Splits a message into multiple messages.

split.title: Split Message By Array
split.description: Splits a message into multiple messages using a given separator. The separator is treated as a path to a property inside the message. If the property is an array, the message is split and multiple messages are emitted. Otherwise the original message is emitted.

splitOnJsonataExpression.title: Split on JSONata Expression
splitOnJsonataExpression.description: Evaluates the input based on a JSONata expression. Assuming the evaluation is an array, the array is split and emitted to multiple messages.
